name: Oshi (ldweller)
description:
Caught in a sudden downpour and washed away, Oshi - the brave young explorer must now find her way home through and adventure through the world she's never seen.

**Update**

With the nature of the Jam, the 2 new files do not contain changes/fixes! We want the game to be presented as it was when the Jam ended! The only change is however an uploaded Mac version and a level-select page so users can skip levels if they wish!
